title: Vertical striped screen of death crash
body:
I was playing nexus siege with my friends a few weeks ago when my computer crashed for the very first time ever to this vertical striped screen. Now whenever I'm in a game playing the same thing keeps happening to me. 
I've downloaded windows 10 in the last recent months and have a AMD Radeon HD 7800 series graphics card. I've updated my driver to most recent one available. 
Anyone know what else could be causing this problem? Thank you.

replies.body: I haven't seen this happen before, but it sounds like your hardware might be started to fail.  We can rule out other possibilities like drivers and other settings through the [game crash ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)guide.  Let me know if the guide gets this fixed up!
Yeah I think my graphics card is failing because this has started to happen with other games now. thank you for your response. :) hopefully I can fix this and get back to gaming soon
